Articles.Content:
Hello All,

I want to start a video series, but I'm not to sure what I want to film. The obvious solution is to ask you guys! Let me know if there's anything cool or challenging you want me to try.
What have you done in KSP so far?

I can go most places in the Kerbol system. I have a few bases set up, working on some SSTO's. The basics really.

- - - Updated - - -

Like make the smallest possible rockets?

One thing that a lot of people have requested is to make replicas of aircraft in real life. I haven't gotten to doing it myself though.

(You may find my Youtube channel to be of some use if you're considering starting a channel of your own. Link is in my signature.)
